greets
Hi IndianChristian. Good work done. Can you upload few christian movies in Indian Languages please. Thanks!

Thank you for the great work you are doing.  Sharing is caring.  I am an Indian Christian also.  I wish my family, relatives, and other Indians would see through the whole idol worship that exists in Hinduism.  They are so tied into it they cannot see that it is a sin.  It is so easy to fall into, even the Isrealites did it even after experiencing the many miracles of God.  Thank you again, for your love for others in sharing these useful videos.  Peace (Shanti).
